title: FS: 1888 Cleveland Blues Cabinet w/Pop Snyder  -  $3125
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Cleveland Blues Cabinet w/Pop Snyder  -  $3125
posts.post_content:
1888 Cleveland Blues Cabinet for sale.  Includes 15 Old Judge players as well as Pop Snyder and Mike Morrison who are not in the OJ set.  Player IDs included below. Photo is 6.5” x 4”.  Back is clean.  Cabinet photos of major league teams are rare and I only know of one other example of this particular photo, mine is by far the nicer of the two. Price drop now  $3,125 or best reasonable offer.  Pm me with any questions.  Thanks for looking! 
Angyale
